nitf_Record Struct Reference

This is a record of the file. More...

#include <Record.h>

Detailed Description

This is a record of the file.

The Record object is a representation of the data within a file. It is structurally hierarchical in a manner that corresponds one-to-one with the components of an NITF file. For most occurences, you can assume that reader will est the header
